mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVE_ID, CLIENT_ID, KEY, RESERVE_TIME, KEY_EXPIRE_TIME, REPAIR_TIME, BODYSHOP_ID) VALUES (#{RESERVE_ID}, #{CLIENT_ID}, #{KEY}, #{RESERVE_TIME}, #{KEY_EXPIRE_TIME}, #{REPAIR_TIME}, #{BODYSHOP_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESERVATION ORDER BY RESERVE_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET KEY=#{KEY} where RESERVE_ID =#{RESERVE_ID}
